title: Icelandic logo
content:
Trying to find this font (or close to it), any help would be much appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ICELANDIC_6135.jpg)
author: waves

comments.content:
A couple of similar fonts, without the tilde crossbar on \_A\_: Beaufort Condensed Bold

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BeaufortCondBoldasICELANDIC_4644.jpg)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032222/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/")  
Flange BQ
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FlangeBQasICELANDIC_4404.jpg)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/flange-bq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032222/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/flange-bq/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/flange-bq/")
